Articles.Content: Its quite obvious that mods are people but considering how quickly they respond to threads that break the rules I think that for basic tasks an ai uses there profile to do basic stuff like banning trolls and stuff.

If you look underneath a post you see a small icon with an exclamation mark inside a triangle: if you click that you can report the post to the moderators. Since we all get alerted whenever someone reports a thread we're usually very quick to respond, even if there's only a limited number of moderators ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
If this is a serious question God help us all.

I heard somewhere that when someone reports a thread/post, every single moderator receives the report instantly. I don't know where that was, though. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

EDIT: Woah! Double ninja!

> 
> Yes.

Fixed.

/10chars

Seriously Dude, of course they are A.I. It's Skynet, The Matrix, Disney all rolled into one. It's all about World domination, man. Thought control. Orwell, man. Orwell. I mean has anybody actually ever seen one in person. They're a construct of some super computers chained together by hyper-lasers in Area 51 run by Majestic 12. And if you do think you have seen one in person, just one word - holograms. Just like on STNG. Only the air was probably atomized with psychedelic aerosol to make you believe that you've seen a real person. Trust me man, none of this is real. Ones and zeros. One and zeros. Now put that in your brain pan and let it simmer. I gotta go before they trace my ip...

[h=1]https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115950-RO-Procedural-Fuel-Tanks-Real-fuels-I-m-losing-Delta-V-more-quickly-that-I-expected/page3

[/h]

Forgot about the Illuminati man.

> 
> Forgot about the Illuminati man.

> 
> If you look underneath a post you see a small icon with an exclamation mark inside a **triangle**

Uhoh.

ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED!

I think the better question would be, is it possible for AI to have secretly advanced to the point where the moderators are 100% A.I.

Why make a big scene killing humans, when you can silently replace them.... maybe you're one of them, the AIs! You are aren't you?

> 
> Uhoh.
> ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED!

Not to be rude or anything, but, ENOUGH ABOUT THE ILLUMINATI!!!!!!
I assure you, all the acting moderators on the forum are completely human or human-created

So there are non acting moderators who are AI? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And I think the OP was asking if there is any kind of scripts that eliminate some posts.

> 
> I assure you, all the acting moderators on the forum are completely human or human-created

OMG! Supernovy confirms it!

> 
> Not to be rude or anything, but, ENOUGH ABOUT THE ILLUMINATI!!!!!!

I think this guy is in on it. Better be quiet around him.

And what if - we all are AI trying to know if the mods are AI ? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) how would one know who's who ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> And I think the OP was asking if there is any kind of scripts that eliminate some posts.

There are tons of scripts. There's one called KasperVld, one called Red Iron Crown, one called Supernovy... I think there used to be one called Rowsdower?

I'm a cybernetic organism. Living tissue over a metal endoskeleton. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Partially AI?

I'd be doing backflips if the moderators were cyborgs.

Eh? There's a possibility they *aren't?*

Uh, that would explain why the forums didn't explode when I PM'd all the moderators "This statement is false".

> 
> Eh? There's a possibility they *aren't?*
> Uh, that would explain why the forums didn't explode when I PM'd all the moderators "This statement is false".

Everyone knows that paradoxes only work in the movies. A simple watch dog timer would indicate the program is stuck in a loop and break out of it.

> 
> *or human-created*

Shush Snovy. Don't want to get the forums all up in a tizzy over a Technicality.
Speaking for myself, I know that I can reliably pass a Turing test on a good day.

I can't speak for the others, but I am definitely not an AI. I am a real, flesh-and-blood person just lik-
